snippet: Yelp's story is one felt across the local advertising industry on the Internet: great potential, strong sales, but no earnings - yet.
abstract: Yelp's story is one felt across the local advertising industry on the Internet: great potential, strong sales, but no earnings - yet.

headline.main: In Debut on Market, Yelp Stock Surges 64%
headline.print_headline: In Debut On Market, Yelp Stock Surges 64%
